title.rendered: Value based cinema screened across schools under Child for Child programme

content.rendered:
Smile Foundation programme, Child for Child’s initiative of screening value based cinema for school children kick started on Children’s Day at Mohali, Umred, Hyderabad and Kolkata.

The aim of the programme is to sensitize children through hand-picked quality films, with assortment of various topics starting from gender equality to environment, family values, friendship, aspirations, dream, self-confidence and importance of education from across the globe.

Child for Child currently reaches out to nearly one million privileged children in 900 schools spread across 417 districts of India, every year. In addition, their parents and teachers are also involved in the process. The programme has today reached out to each part of India with the exception of Lakshadweep.
